name: TotalMusherNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Detail news, race dates, results, interviews, analysis of the world of racing sled dogs, mushers, race venues, volunteers and fans by veteran mushers and enthusiasts. Extra info and links can be found on the Detail Skill Card, click on (Read more). During the peak of the racing season the content will be updated hourly or sooner.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
